description: Compact enough to fit on your nightstand, the Philips Fidelio DS1100 Docking Speaker plays music from your iPod or iPhone with pristine detail and clarity. With its unique circular design, the speaker projects the music in all directions, filling your bedroom with rich and balanced sound. In addition, the DS1100 automatically synchronizes with your mobile device's clock settings and includes an adjustable light, so it functions as a convenient bedside clock and night-light. This multifunctional docking speaker also supports Philips' Fidelio app, which unlocks additional features, such as custom alarms and sound settings.
title: Philips Fidelio DS1100 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Alarm Clock Speaker Dock
